title: What is digital asset management? - Quora

response.answer_text: Digital asset management (DAM) is a combination of processes and technology that helps in improving findability, organization, shareability and overall management of digital assets like images, videos and files. DAM software is delivered as a cloud offering or as an on-premise solution. Here are some of the core functions of a digital asset management software Search. The No. 1 thing a DAM does is it makes it easy to locate digital assets based on a variety of criteria. The search usually includes the following:Keyword searchFile type search (Image or illustration)Meta data tag driven searchFile extension searchAsset orientation (landscape or portrait)Image or IllustrationShareable. Once assets are located, the next function must be to easily share these digital assets. Sharing can be by email address or creating a temporary link.Organization. A DAM supports categorization in a way that makes it easy for a user to locate the digital assets if they are not aware of the keywords. This categorization is usually configurable.Transformations. A DAM usually supports some sort of transformation and bulk renaming. This allows you to take a hi-rez source to convert into something a user needs.Lightboxes. This allows packaging of digital assets for a specific use case.Some of the core functions of a DAM are storing, organizing, and updating the digital assets B2B and B2C companies use to sell products online, like 360-degree images, installation guides and videos, and CAD schematic drawings. DAM also lets you manage metadata, so you don’t have to waste time hunting down the exact video you need or image you want to update. DAM functionality also allows you to push out images and videos according to the specific requirements of the websites and vendors you sell with, so your images, for example, are always the right format, size, and resolution. Also, by connecting a DAM with a product information management (PIM) system, you can keep all of your product content in one place. Digital assets are files such as images, videos, photos, documents and other media. In our current business environment, the demand for more media and more information is growing exponentially and that means businesses need a system that can handle all their digital assets, preferably within one simple-to-use location. DAM software solves this dilemma – and one of the biggest issues facing project, marketing and operations managers across the globe – the overabundance of digital content. DAM lets managers upload, organize, manage, share, store, and track their digital assets efficiently, and all in one place.
